Django DetailView Template

Descripción

Django generic DetailView template


File Template: ✅


Prefix

dj:detailview


Scopes

python


Snippet de código

from django.views.generic import DetailView
from .models import ${1:ModelName}

class ${1:ModelName}DetailView(DetailView):
	model = ${1:ModelName}
	template_name = '${2:app_name}/${1:ModelName_lower}_detail.html'
